extension.description: Open markdown files in preview mode by default.
command.markdownReader.formatBold.title: Format Bold
command.markdownReader.formatLink.title: Insert Link
submenu.format.label: Format
submenu.heading.label: Heading
submenu.code.label: Code
configuration.title: Markdown Preview
configuration.enabled.description: Enable the Markdown Preview extension. When disabled, markdown files open in standard VS Code editor mode.
configuration.excludePatterns.descriptio: Glob patterns for files and folders to exclude from auto-preview. Files matching these patterns will open in standard editor mode.
configuration.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for auto-preview (default: 1MB = 1048576). Files larger than this will open in editor mode with an info message.
configuration.editorAssociations.descrip: Add a workspace editor association so markdown files open directly in the preview editor (reduces initial flicker).
